headline: AES Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of The AES Corporation (NYSE: AES) declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.17595 per share payable on May 15, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 1, 2025.

headline: The AES Corporation (AES): Among the Worst Performing Utilities Stocks to Buy According to Analysts
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Worst Performing Utilities Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The AES Corporation (NYSE:AES) stands against the other bad performing utilities stocks. As 2025 kicks off, the global energy sector continues to face a volatile and fast-moving landscape, […]
